targets.query:
from(bucket: "cellVoltages")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "BatteryCellReading" and r.BatteryNumber == "0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Cell01" or r._field == "Cell02" or r._field == "Cell03" or r._field == "Cell04" or r._field == "Cell05" or r._field == "Cell06" or r._field == "Cell07" or r._field == "Cell08" 
                    or r._field == "Cell09" or r._field == "Cell10" or r._field == "Cell11" or r._field == "Cell12" or r._field == "Cell13" or r._field == "Cell14" or r._field == "Cell15" or r._field == "Cell16")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bmsReadings")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "BatteryReading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "CellVoltageHigh")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bmsReadings")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "BatteryReading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "CellVoltageLow")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "cellVoltages")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "BatteryCellReading" and r.BatteryNumber == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Cell01" or r._field == "Cell02" or r._field == "Cell03" or r._field == "Cell04" or r._field == "Cell05" or r._field == "Cell06" or r._field == "Cell07" or r._field == "Cell08" 
                    or r._field == "Cell09" or r._field == "Cell10" or r._field == "Cell11" or r._field == "Cell12" or r._field == "Cell13" or r._field == "Cell14" or r._field == "Cell15" or r._field == "Cell16")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bmsReadings")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "BmsReading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Watts")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bmsReadings")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "BatteryReading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "BatteryCurrent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bmsReadings")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "BatteryReading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "BatteryVoltage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bmsReadings")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "BmsReading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Amps")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bmsReadings")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "BatteryReading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "BatteryCurrent")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "CurrentLimit")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "DischargedTotal")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "StateOfCharge")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "bmsReadings")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "BmsReading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Amps")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
